    Methods in neqsim.process.util.fire with parameters of type Flare
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SeparatorFireExposure.FireExposureResult
    SeparatorFireExposure.evaluate(Separator separator, SeparatorFireExposure.FireScenarioConfig config, Flare flare, double flareGroundDistanceM)
    Aggregates fire heat-load, wall-temperature, and rupture calculations including optional flare radiation based on the actual flaring heat duty.
